___PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

___CustomBehavior.description: Custom Paths to be migrated from source system

___Context.description: The context to which custom paths apply.

___Paths.description: The custom paths to be migrated from a source system to a target system.

___TargetPathInUserHome.description: If true, the target path is located within a user home directory.

___SourcePath.description: The path to the migrating file or directory on the source system.

___SourcePathInUserHome.description: If true, the source path is located within a user home directory.

___TargetPath.description: The path to the destination file or directory on the target system.

___PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

___PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

___PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.
